backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and in-memory maps for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitor requests, profiles, and notifications, along with helper validation and authorization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and assets.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting how to set a canonical app URL for IC deployments.
frontend/deploy/ic-deploy-with-retry.sh: Deployment script for IC mainnet adding retries, cycles readiness checks, error classification, and optional canister pre-creation.
frontend/deploy/ic-precreate-canisters.s: Script that explicitly creates backend and frontend canisters on IC mainnet to avoid reservation failures before deployment.
frontend/deploy/README.md: Explains prerequisites and steps for deploying the project to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/docs/deployment-troubleshooting: Troubleshooting guide describing common IC deployment issues and readiness checks with verification commands.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page setting metadata, a startup loading UI, redirect logic for ic0.app, and error fallback handling before loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, theme colors, start URL, and app icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch, and activate handlers with caching logic for navigation, scripts, styles, and assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and authentication flow managing identity, profile loading, error handling, and conditional rendering of dashboards and pages.
frontend/src/components/FatalStartupErro: UI component that displays a fatal startup error with reload and hard-reload actions.
frontend/src/components/FlatNumberPicker: Flat number picker allowing typed input, arrow navigation, and popover selection of valid flat numbers.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, header, PWA install handling, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Reusable dashboard card supporting icons, actions, variants, and custom content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component for creating a user profile with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateCard.t: Card wrapper that displays loading, error, empty, or content states for queries.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorBoun: Error boundary capturing startup errors and showing a fatal error screen if triggered.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: UI screen offering retry, logout, and hard reload options when startup fails.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context provider managing actor initialization, timeout handling, and refetch logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor, reacting to identity changes and invalidating queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorContext.ts: Hook to access the ActorContext and enforce provider usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Implements a hook that detects PWA install availability and exposes a prompt function to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, maintenance records, payments, and related actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, responsive tweaks, and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChangePasswordPage.ts: Renders a form for changing the user’s password and handles validation, mutation, logout, and navigation after success.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticeDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a single notice, including title, message, expiry, and navigation back to the notice list.
frontend/src/pages/common/NoticesPage.ts: Displays all notices, allows secretaries to create, export, and print notices, and navigates to notice details.
frontend/src/pages/common/NotificationsP: Shows user notifications with unread/read sections and supports marking one or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintDetailP: Shows detailed information for a specific complaint including status, description, priority, and resolution note.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ComplaintsPage.t: Lets users lodge new complaints and view a list of their existing complaints with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ExpendituresPage: Placeholder page explaining that expenditure tracking is unavailable due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/flat/FlatDashboardPag: Home dashboard for flat users with quick-access cards for maintenance, expenditures, complaints, notices, visitors, and profile.
Allows users to view maintenance status, pay via UPI, and record payment details for selected months and years.
frontend/src/pages/flat/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages viewing and editing up to four mobile numbers for the logged‑in user's flat, including add/remove UI and mutation to save changes.
frontend/src/pages/flat/VisitorRequestsP: Displays visitor requests for the user's flat and allows approving or declining them with flat‑number validation.
frontend/src/pages/guard/GuardDashboardP: Guard dashboard showing counts and navigation cards for viewing requests, creating requests, and checking notices.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestC: Form for guards to create a visitor request, fetch flat mobile numbers, and open a WhatsApp deep link after creation.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequestD: Shows detailed information for a single visitor request, including status, flat, purpose, and contact number.
frontend/src/pages/guard/VisitorRequests: Lists all visitor requests with sorting, status badges, optional WhatsApp sender info, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login UI using Internet Identity, handling logo loading, errors, and login attempts.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsA: Displays all complaints with stats, CSV export, and print options using query data and a table layout.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/ComplaintsR: Generates a print‑friendly complaints report with summary counts and a detailed table.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/components/: Provides a skeleton placeholder UI for the settings page while data loads.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/CreateNotic: Form page for creating a new notice with optional expiry and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/Expenditure: Manages monthly expenditures, allowing entry, editing, CSV export, printing, and saving via mutation.
Print‑optimized expenditure report showing all items, total, and notes for a selected month and year.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/NoticesRepo: Print view listing all notices with IDs, messages, and expiry dates in sorted order.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/OverduePage: Shows overdue flats for selected month/year and allows sending notifications to all overdue units.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsPag: Renders the secretary payments management UI, fetching payment status for all flats and enabling CSV export and print actions.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/PaymentsRep: Loads payment status data for a given month/year and auto-triggers a printable report view.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SecretaryDa: Displays the secretary dashboard with navigation cards and overdue-flats status loading.
frontend/src/pages/secretary/SettingsPag: Manages secretary configuration settings, including logo upload, validation, and saving updates.
frontend/src/utils/canonicalUrl.ts: Utility functions for handling canonical URLs, origins, base paths, and URL joining.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV generation and download utilities with proper field escaping.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date helpers for current month/year, timestamp formatting, and month/year lists.
frontend/src/utils/flatNumbers.ts: Generates, validates, formats, and navigates through valid flat numbers in defined 1–5 floor ranges.
frontend/src/utils/hardReload.ts: Clears caches and service workers, then forces a full page reload.
frontend/src/utils/overdue.ts: Determines if the current date is overdue and whether to show an overdue notice.
frontend/src/utils/print.ts: Opens a print view in a new tab and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/sanitizeError.ts: Sanitizes error objects into safe, user-friendly messages while removing sensitive data.
frontend/src/utils/settingsValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes secretary settings fields like maintenance amount, UPI ID, and guard number.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds a UPI payment deep link with ID, amount, and note.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and session parameter parsing, persistence, and cleanup for routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Creates a WhatsApp deep link using a cleaned phone number and encoded message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
frontend/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema, features, and deployment-related requirements.
